name: Paracas + Nazca
description: Paracas and Nazca are located on the Southern Coast of Peru. These multi-activity destinations are surrounded by spectacular golden deserts. The Nazca Lines are located in the Pampa of San Jose, on an area of 50 km². These ancient geo-glyphs depict animals and plants, and some of them can reach up to 300 meters in length, and occupy an area of 1,000 m².
